Title: Self-medicating with HCQ for COVID-19 dangerous, warn experts - The News Minute
Description: Earlier this week, the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) approved the use of antimalarial drug hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) for high risk individuals as a precaution against the novel coronavirus. Several countries around the world have adopted the use of…

Title: UK pledges £544 million to find Coronavirus Vaccine - indiablooms
Description: London/IBNS: The UK Government has pledged an additional £210 million of support to accelerate work to find a coronavirus vaccine, in an announcement following a virtual summit of G20 leaders.

Title: Messenger Now Has A Coronavirus Community Hub To Curb Misinformation - Mashable India
Description: After WhatsApp, the other Facebook messaging service, Messenger has launched its own hub dedicated to coronavirus to curb the spread of misinformation and also offer tips & tricks on how to optimally use the platform in times of social distancing.

Title: Will Indian summer be the answer to slowing down the coronavirus pandemic? - THE WEEK

Title: Coronavirus impact: How did Modi govt arrive at 21-day lockdown period and not 14 - International Business Times, India Edition
Description: There is scientific evidence and epidemiological significance to reason out why the Modi government imposed a national lockdown period of 21-days and not lesser than 21.

Title: This Korean series predicted coronavirus outbreak 2 years ago. Uncanny similarities - India Today
Description: A Korean series predicted the novel coronavirus outbreak 2 years ago. The uncanny similarities will blow your mind.
